html:
5.10.25  6:50 am   how am i supposed to ask questions here?

      i have no idea

5.10.25  6:01 am   how to use soap

      how about mixing soap with soap

5.10.25  3:44 am   if something is just a quarter, how many should you have

      4 times as many quarters as the number of whole things you want

5.10.25  3:42 am   what year is it

      must be in the billions by now

5.10.25  3:19 am   Favorite historical empire?

      reading between the lines, i think what really counts is that i just name one. ... so how about.... Blockbuster Video

5.10.25  2:48 am   how does the question "what time is it" work what with the effects of time dilation due to everyone's unique frame of reference?

     those effects would be negligible in most situations when that question is asked

     actually, a better question is what the hell is time dilation?

     various ways that time can get stretched when you're dealing with things that move INSANELY fast, or things that are INSANELY heavy

5.10.25  2:09 am   How does Bill Wurtz find chords?

      how do you find what pitches to speak words at, when talking normally? heck, not even musicians know that one

5.10.25  1:48 am   What is your opinion on rabbits

      i can't believe those ears

5.10.25  1:32 am   how was your lunch bill?

      pretty good. i'm thinking of having lunch again in the future

5.10.25  1:13 am   when were the tunes released in early March 2010 (burger king, little door, etc) written? and given that was the first time you had recorded and produced that many songs, how was that experience?

      most of that was written on the spot, at that time. it was exciting to finaly lower the quality bar so much that i might................ actually get into the building

5.10.25  12:21 am   any tips or techniques on making thing imperfect?

      make it on earth

5.10.25  12:04 am   is it more important what is put into art or what art means to the people who did not make it

      it's like in sports, which team is more important. play to find out

5.9.25  11:43 pm   did you have a good day today?

      what about tomorrow

5.9.25  10:00 pm   thoughts on male bird dances?

      dignified, respectable,

5.9.25  9:44 pm   even though you have no experience, what do you think would be the best method to learn the saxophone?

      i would say the first step would be get a saxophone, the next thing would be maybe just check out a brief to tutorial about how to even get sound out of the thing. beyond that i'd say the buttons are auditorily self explanatory. and then enjoy

5.9.25  9:27 pm   Do you ever ask yourself questions here?

      no

5.9.25  7:37 pm   opinions on legumes?

      through a trick of language, in France, all vegetables are legumes

5.9.25  6:35 pm   Is it possible that unicorn eat pancakes for diner

      i'll admit, that doesn't sound incorrect

5.9.25  5:47 pm   What is, in your opinion, one authentic New York experience everyone (who has the financial means to do so) should have at least once in their lifetime?

      i don't think i would recommend everyone to have the exact same experience

5.9.25  3:46 pm   what's qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm!?

     that's basically the letters on a normal keyboard, in order row by row from top left to bottom right

     also can you please rearrange qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm?

     the only other obvious arrangement would be 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'

     Have a great day :)

5.9.25  2:09 pm   So why random selection rather than selecting a song idea that appeals to you most in the moment?

      you might need to use a random selection when youve already tried choosing one you 'want' to do, but everything is crumbling under the pressure. sometimes every song has SOME reason why you shouldnt do it (heck, that's what makes a song good usually). so you might keep getting scared to choose any of them. so in that situation, it's important to remember that you can always resort to a randomized choice

5.9.25  1:32 pm   if you type into an internet search engine 'cute puppies' it may show you pictures of cute puppies or information on cute puppies

      some web browsers have that as the default

5.9.25  12:26 pm   Do you think turtles know they are turtles, or do they think they are people?

      they dont think they are humans, that's for sure. but they probably do think of themself as a person. of course 'person' is an english word, so they probably dont think in english. need translation

5.9.25  11:59 am   why do people name things all the time

      to keep track of which thing is which

5.9.25  11:46 am   are you the new pope???

      no but i've been to lunch with him. Wait no sorry i was thinking of someone else

5.9.25  10:46 am   Would you like to be my Corn partner for the Corn dance at the Corn ball (maybe we can be crowned Corn King and Corn Queen)? Then, we can have a Corn marriage by a Corn priest and have Corn kids? 

      i think you have been reading one too many corn tales

5.9.25  10:20 am   Mr Wurtz, how do you type with gloves on?

      maybe you could use very thin gloves

5.9.25  7:38 am   what's your favorite pizza

      the dollar places in manhattan, adjusted for inflation of course

5.9.25  6:44 am   Is spaghetti a string?

      technically yes

5.9.25  6:01 am   have you ever dealt with perfectionism when creating something?

     i dont even like perfect things, that seems terribly boring, but i will admit i get overly obsessed with whether or not i can make it amazing

      should artists have any emotional attachment to what they make? even just a slim?

      they probably can't control their attachment level. but what i would wonder is: can less attached people and more attached people both accel in creative endeavors, and i would venture optimistically to posit yes

5.9.25  2:37 am   what's your opinion on the theremin

      i've never tried one. i figure i'd wait until everyone else isn't trying it

5.9.25  1:58 am   how to make a story feel more funny?

      you just have to be in a funny mood when you are writing it. that's the only thing you can do, but you can't really predict when that's gonna be

5.9.25  12:29 am   have you ever considered making a blog dedicated to sharing the music you've been listening to? would you?

      that sounds like a good idea but i'm not ready to do it yet

5.8.25  11:38 pm   Whats the most common question you get?

      this one

5.8.25  11:35 pm   Did you answer the previous question truthfully?

      yes i believe so

5.8.25  10:38 pm   Have you ever had the opportunity to use the word "gingerly"?

      yes i believe so

5.8.25  10:07 pm   Would you rather have all grass turn into carpet or all carpet turn into grass

      i don't have the right kind of expertise for this

5.8.25  9:21 pm   Have any of these questions directly inspired a song you've made?

What about indirectly?

      indirectly, someone asked what the title of my next song would be, and i didn't know so i just made up something, saying "it might be called ground planes but it might not". i wrote down the title anyway, and in due time the title got selected for musicification, then further writing, then eventually selected for production

5.8.25  9:05 pm   let's exchange an HEX code! here is a soft green : #68ab7a

      ok, here's a... bright green. 00FF00

5.8.25  7:44 pm   What is 77 + 33 I'm actually so lost

      110

5.8.25  7:38 pm   "the hardest thing about building a room is you have to build a room to build the damn room in first. it drives me crazy"... drives you crazy, where is crazy driving you to?

      'drives me crazy' means 'is challenging'

5.8.25  7:35 pm   What question do I ask 

      'What question do i ask'

5.8.25  7:11 pm   what time is it

      'the present'

5.8.25  5:49 pm   How do I make a castle sturdier?

      dig a hole as tall as the castle and then build the castle in the hole twice as tall and then fill in the hole and use only the top half of the castle

5.8.25  5:32 pm   I empathize with your quantized glissando même.

      oh good. empathy is precisely what i was seeking

5.8.25  5:28 pm   what percentage of conspiracies are, or have the capacity to be, true

      the problem here is knowing the exact number of conspiracies, which is also a conspiracy

5.8.25  4:05 pm   any tips for driving on the new jersey turnpike

      time travelers will enjoy driving on georges rd, king georges rd, st georges rd, old york road, and kings highway. if you can put together the pieces

5.8.25  3:23 pm   i have text of the song done, but can't find the rhythm, melody, nor chords to accompany it, any advices? 

      the truth is, you can make it any way you want. although i realize this may be traumatizing

5.8.25  2:33 pm   Is lemon tart overrated?

      i have no idea what the rating of lemon tart is

5.8.25  2:26 pm   how do you feel now that you're the new pope

      i was going to ask you how you felt, to be the new pope
